subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Early-round winners will also receive a significant bump in pay as the total purse for the tennis tournament increases by $4 million, to $38.3 million, the U.S.T.A. said.
snippet: Early-round winners will also receive a significant bump in pay as the total purse for the tennis tournament increases by $4 million, to $38.3 million, the U.S.T.A. said.
